Perceptor::

Percertor heard the the weapons come, he dodged them and said "Come 
on Swichtblade... I can heard every thing that you throw me, I can 
heard any move that you do..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade --
> 
> Switchblade smiles. A nearly transparent covering slides over both 
> optics, causing his green eyes to darken slightly. His night vision 
> comes online, and he chuckles to himself. <Hmm, thus one of 
> Firestrike's weaknesses is uncovered (no means of night vision), 
> perhaps unwittingly... oh well, there can be only one end to this 
> situation>. 
> 
> Softly, Switchblade presses a few buttons on the control panel, and 
> positions himself so that Firestrike isn't in his line of fire. 
> Silently, he whips two energon daggers at Perceptor, one at each 
> shoulder, hoping that Firestrike's distraction would be sufficient 
> to finish this.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > Perceptor jumped to a side and fired against the lights and the 
> > computer's controls, he did that lights turned off and internal 
> > weapons couldn't open fire against him.
> > 
> > "I wanna see" said Perceptor"what can you do in my world....my 
> dark 
> > world...."
> >
